data.title: A Site Hold / Delay Sky Smoke from B Site
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to assist your teammates on A Site in delaying the Attackers from pushing onto A, when you are playing from Generator on B Site.

data.title: B Site Chokepoint Delay Smoke + Incendiary
data.description: Use this Sky Smoke + Incendiary setup to delay people from pushing through the B Main chokepoint into B Site.
